page.title: 10A LOCAL CHARACTER-GEORGE
page.content: George Mason is quite plump.He has got white hair and is going a bit bald. He is very friendly.He gets on well with every one.Mason is a very common name,it has been in this village for a very long time.George runs the school discos.He is the village milkman.He runs a taxi service.Georges wife is called Pam.She comes round collecting the milk money.George tells a lot of jokes.He used to help run the football team but he does not any more. George takes food from our school kitchen to other near by schools. George has got an alsation dog called Domade.George has got two sons and he is a grandfather.The village would not be the same with-out George.
